title: Notes on Daily Assignments
text:
You may have noticed that in addition to typing in answers to questions, you may take notes in the app. Tap the personal notes panel at the bottom. You can type or use the voice-to-text option which is also available as you add your answers to questions in the commentary.

 

Be sure to tap Save on all notes and answers as you enter them! Your notes and answers are only accessible by you. Notes youâ€™ve added can be found by tapping the notepad icon in the lower right of the segment.
